title: Plant Buddy
subtitle: AI-Powered Plant Disease Detection
description: Detect plant diseases quickly and accurately using our advanced AI technology. Take a photo or upload an image to get instant results.
cameraNotSupported: Camera not supported by your browser
analysisError: Error analyzing image. Please try again.
uploadError: Error uploading image. Please try again.
smartCompanion: Your Smart Companion for Healthy Gardens
smartDiseaseDetectionDesc: Advanced AI-powered image recognition identifies diseases from leaf and fruit photos with high accuracy.
comprehensivePlantDatabaseDesc: Covers major diseases affecting tomato, potato, citrus, mango, apple, and many other common plants.
preventionTreatmentDesc: Get tailored organic and integrated pest management recommendations to prevent disease spread.
forEveryoneDesc: Perfect for hobbyists, small-scale farmers, gardeners, and anyone passionate about plant health.
whatPlantBuddyHelps: What Plant Buddy Helps You Do
homeGardenersDesc: Keep your backyard garden, indoor plants, and flower beds healthy and thriving.
smallScaleFarmersDesc: Protect your crops and increase yields with early disease detection and treatment.
orchardOwnersDesc: Maintain healthy fruit trees and prevent disease spread across your orchard.
